title: Excitement as Mr. Ibu visits #BBNaija house - Punch Newspapers
text:
Excitement as Mr. Ibu visits #BBNaija house Published 
#BBNaija Housemates were all thrilled on Wednesday when Biggie surprised them with a visit to the house by popular Nollywood comedian, Mr. Ibu. 
Excited housemates screamed like children and rushed to hug the actor. 
Bassey led the charge at the comedian as others followed bursting into loud applause. Even Uriel who speaks Queenâ€™s English hugged the comedian so tightly people would think Mr. Ibu was her long lost brother. 
It was a much needed relief for all the housemates who had gone through a nauseating dark bath. 
See the warm welcome below. The Housemates were very excited to see Mr Ibu. Click on the video to watch as they screamed in excitement. #BBNaija #BBSeeGobbe pic.twitter.com/r8S3Z2IsHX
